website_summaries.verdict: For cash-heavy businesses and organizations, this bill counter is a true workhorse in the office. Fast and accurate, with a 6-hour operating time.
pros: Use magnetic, UV, and infrared sensors to detect counterfeits
Can work up to 6 hours continuously
Checks for half notes and broken notes

customer_reviews.title: I couldn’t have dreamed of a better money counter!!
customer_reviews.text: For the longest time, I’ve suffered with having to count large stacks of bills by hand. I can’t tell you how many hours I’ve wasted convincing myself not to get a professional-grade money counter like this one. It does in seconds what would normally take me 20-30 minutes (not counting time wasted losing count or making an error). Seamlessly devours whole stacks of bills, never missing a single one. If jammed, stops immediately leaving the misplaced bill(s) unharmed for removal. Love the counterfeit detection on it as well. Been working great so far for almost a month. No problems with display. Very aesthetic exterior design 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Vadim Seylanov

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm very happy with this machine. It will occasionally jam, but most of the time it's a result of the quality of the bills and not the machine itself. The trickiest thing to using it is the way to load the bills into the feeder - the way that the diagram shows seems to jam more frequently for me, so I ended up loading smaller quantities and leaning them toward me (instead of away) and it's been working fine. For the price, this machine is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mama x2

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m sooo glad I chose to buy this machine!! It’s quick, accurate, and very smooth. I have been using it for over a month now and I don’t even know how I did my job without it. I love the fact that it can detect a fraudulent bill better than I can. Haha It’s worth every penny and I will be buying more of them for my other businesses as well and suggest it to every business owner I know. Great product and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: heba.aslanyan

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: The machine works well out of the box. It has a handle when moving. Compact. Sleek. A constructive idea is to send an operational manual that isn't so anemic with little useful info. Right out of the box it counted very accurately but if the money was "bowed or slightly folded" and facing the discharge point, it would rain money which is cool but not great everywhere. This isn't covered in the manual or online. Countless experiments proved facing the money the opposite direction stopped it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, accurate counter. I still put all bills t hrough twice but have not found any mistakes. Error has kicked out bills for being excessively worn. I like that...it may question if they're counterfeit (they weren't) and I'd rather err on the side of caution. Very strong and sturdy. Easy to use. I highly recommend this counter, especially for the price. I tried to buy anoher one for a friend but they were temporarily out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: richard j pryor

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality machine
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this money counter, it seems to be a very super high quality pieces of machinery. It detects counterfeit bills in 3 different ways and it impressed me when it actually detected a counterfeit bill one time... Sometimes the money gets stuck, but after a few uses you will get the hang of it and then things will run super smooth, you just have to put the money in at the right angle, thats all. If you need one, this one is great. P.S. It doesnt automatically detect the value of your bills, it just counts the number of bills put in it.
customer_reviews.author: Woolfolk

customer_reviews.title: We returned it and Amazon was wonderful and credited our account immediately
customer_reviews.text: The first time we ordered this it arrived with some of the led lights not working in the digital display which is a real problem because when it should display a 3 it would show a 7. We returned it and Amazon was wonderful and credited our account immediately, provided free shipping label, and we received a new one within days. We love the way the machine functions so we wanted to get this one with all the led lights working. Great product for the price. It appears that Teraputics really cares about the product too, a nice change!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to count bills and find any counterfeits. It counts like a charm, has counted correctly when bills were stuck together and I made mistakes counting. Hasn't flagged any counterfeits, so I'm going on faith that part works too. Price was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C.

customer_reviews.title: Just as described.
customer_reviews.text: It gets stuck sometimes when there are large bundles of cash that tends to be older or may have wrinkles. After straightened out it will go right through.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Goodrum

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The worst!!! I intended to buy this to count $1 bills! It will RUIN your money! If it’s not 100% straight and beat don’t count on it working!! Takes forever and sometimes has an inaccurate count. Money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: jackiesha

customer_reviews.title: Solid Little Machine. Very Quiet.  It was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Solid Little Machine, seems nice and solid. I bought this to count cash to load in ATM's and it seems to work just fine. Doesn't hold a lot of money but sorting bundles in 100 lots it will do the job. Haven't had a error since I purchased it. For what I paid for it $140 its less than most and has heavy gears, even came with a cleaning instructions which I felt was value added.
customer_reviews.author: A Myhre

customer_reviews.title: Very simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and easy to use, this machine works as advertised. It processes bills very quickly, and can even detect counterfeit bills. I was very impressed with the elegant and compact design, and I've been using it heavily for my small business. If you're looking for a simple, and fast money counter that works, I would definitely recommend this one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy - only Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: This product was very good for a few months but then the battery started to ware. Doesnt work all the time, only some times now for a few minutes then stops. I dont think its accurate either.
customer_reviews.author: seth

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: Lots faster than counting by hand. Only used for 1 week works great so far. after 2 months led screen has quit working
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: We purchased the money counter Elite for the many functions ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the money counter Elite for the many functions. We have tested the machine, yet to run it through the big test of actually using in a work horse setting. I have confidence it will perform just as we need.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Baker

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Jam- Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works really smooth. Use it like suggested, bills leaned forward first, then lean them back and the machine will do the rest. As noted in description, machine does not distinguish different bills. It counts how many bills.. not how much money. I.E. if you put 40... twenty dollars bills, it will read 40.. not $800.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to like about this flimsy machine
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to like about this flimsy machine. It was half the price of the one I normally use so decided to give it a try. Turns out you do get what you pay for. The bills kept getting stuck and destroyed both my $50 and $100 bills! Returning for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Shayne Ward

customer_reviews.title: Best machine for daily use
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine makes my day easier and counts are accurate
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Manzano

customer_reviews.title: It's very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This thing does what it says it does - counts money. It's very easy to use, plug it in and put the money in, no instruction manual needed. Bills don't get jammed or stuck like other money printers, this one is very precise and fast. Doesn't take up too much space and looks cool. If you are looking for a money counter at a good price without the hassle, I'd recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Money Counter!
customer_reviews.text: We've had money counters before that just didn't work well for us. The Money Counter Elite is wonderful! It's very accurate and the bills don't get tangled in the machine like the other counters we have had. I recommend it highly to anyone looking for a good money counter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the money counter in Dec 2016. <br ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the money counter in Dec 2016. It is now July 2 2017 passing only 6 months. The display shows incorrect number of count. "0" shows "7". I need a replacement but no where I can claim in Amazon. Maybe I don't know where I find a claim...

customer_reviews.text: Great product- although some of my team has had trouble feeding stacks through the machine.

customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this money counter for two weeks , and so far it’s been a great purchase. Excellent value, saves a lot of time, and accurate.

customer_reviews.text: This machine worked great and made counting bills so much easier and faster.

customer_reviews.text: Doesn't decider between different bills placed in he machine. You have to separate the 5, 10, 20's etc before placing in machine then program it to count that particular currency. It's such a hassle.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent money counter!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent money counter! It's fast, quite and accurate, detects the counterfeit bills very well. I recommend!

customer_reviews.text: I have a business and have purchased about 5 counters. This is the fastest counter. Only had it for a week, but seems to be working great.

customer_reviews.text: Our festival pulls in about $500,000 in one weekend. This machine worked so great, we immediately ordered another one. Highly recommend it!

customer_reviews.title: It works.

customer_reviews.text: This counterfeit detector money counter is amazing and great way to save time and keep track while counting😎👌🤘

customer_reviews.title: Great product with affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine to avoid the hassle of manually counting the cash. It worked perfectly. I counted a large amount of cash containing 20s, 10s, 5s and 1s. When I took the cash to bank, teller counted the cash and it totally matched 100%. I would recommend this to anyone who has small to medium size business involving large amounts of cash.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly

customer_reviews.text: This has become indispensable for my job. Not as heavy duty as the one at the bank, but it has worked very well for my needs running the concessions at a theatre.

customer_reviews.text: This product arrived quickly and has been very useful. Its very quick and accurate which is important because I trust that it is counting my money correctly. Would highly recommend product!!

customer_reviews.title: It's too fast .

customer_reviews.title: Is very quick and easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be exactly what we needed. Is very quick and easy to understand.

customer_reviews.title: worst instruction manual  no online support
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box. My initial reaction is very unhappy. The instructions are badly written and very difficult to understand. They use many abbreviations in the instructions and no explanations of what they stand for. It shows an adjustment screw in the instructions and not where to find it on the machine. It comes with an extra "belt" but doesn't show how to replace it. I cannot find any online resource for help at all. My opinion may change but right now< this machine leaves a lot to be desired.. Mainly because the instructions are so bad.
customer_reviews.author: C B PARRISH

customer_reviews.title: Looking to buy some good dependable machine
customer_reviews.text: I buy in Jan 2017. Hardly used two times a day for two three months. Most of the time complaint from bank over and under short . This machine is not dependable. Looking for return. Under waranty for two years. Looking to buy some good dependable machine.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.author: Larae

customer_reviews.title: In the manual it shows that it can support upto ...
customer_reviews.text: In the manual it shows that it can support upto 220V so, i connected it to 220V outlet,as soon as i connected it started burning. Then i looked on the machine it says that it can support only 110V.
customer_reviews.author: Prashanth

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Label
customer_reviews.text: I feel deceived ... "money counter" to me means if I put in bills, it will count the value of those bills. When I count money manually, the idea is to determine how much purchasing power it represents, not how many pieces of paper I have. For example, if I put in a $1.00 bill, a $5.00 bill, and a $10.00 dollar bill, I expect it to tell me $16.00. But its answer is 3. As in 3 bills. Not as useful as I had hoped. I'll be returning it. Hopefully this will help others who might make my mistake. Think of this piece of equipment as a "Bill Counter", not a money counter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Money Counter Elite w/Fast Count - UV/MG/IR Counterfeit Bill Detection, Counterfeit Alarm, 1200 Bills Per Minute, Professional Cash Counting Machine
product_meta.description:
PLEASE READ: THIS MACHINE COUNTS THE TOTAL NUMBER OF BILLS ONLY AND DOES NOT DETECT THE VALUE OF THE CURRENCY.

WARNING:THIS MACHINE CAN ONLY BE USED WITH 110V +/- 10% 60Hz. DO NOT USE THIS MACHINE WITH ANY OTHER VOLTAGE UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES OR YOU WILL DAMAGE THE MACHINE.

SIMPLY PUT: THIS MACHINE WAS DESIGNED FOR UNITED STATES OUTLETS ONLY. DO NOT USE IN FOREIGN OUTLETS OR YOU WILL DAMAGE THE MACHINE.

You will not find a better money counter for a better price on the market today. This is why our money counter is a bestseller. It is a premium perfectly engineered piece of machinery. Everybody needs to have one of these in their house or business. An essential tool for anybody who likes to/needs to count money/bills/cash. Let the machine do all the work for you, save hours everyday and feel great while doing it. 

You have never seen a faster, more accurate, more reliable, more user friendly money counter than this one right here. It also makes an amazing gift for practically anybody! 

You will love this! We do. It's just such a great device that every person must own. It always comes in handy.

Please click add to cart and get yours right away! 

Features:
Automatic counting 
Preset counting 
Add counting 
Half notes & broken notes checking 
Chain notes checking 
Automatic self checking 
Automatic zero clearing 
Counterfeit alarm 
UV detecting 
MG detecting 
IR detecting
feature_bullets: This machine counts the total number of bills only and does not detect the value of the currency. The leading brand of Money Counters with the highest possible quality and craftsmanship.
Ultraviolet (UV), Magnetic (MG) and Infrared (IR) sensors with a counterfeit detection rate of 1/800000. Quiet operation (less than 60db), energy saving mode, user friendly, LED display
Very Powerful: Works up to 6 continuous hours while counting 1200 bills per minute
This machine was designed for United States outlets only (110V +/- 10% 60Hz). Do not use this machine with any other voltage under any circumstances or you will damage the machine.
45 day money back guarantee. Return the money counter back to us within 45 days for any reason
